Package com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbAccess
    Provides all the services needed to connect and disconnect the server from a generic DBMS.
    DbAccessFactory
    Provides an utility to choose the appropriate DbAccess class for the database currently in use.
    DbAccessWithUser
    Provides utility to handle a connection with a generic DBMS that supports the creation of users.
    MySQLAccess
    Provides utility to connect with a MySQL DBMS.
    PostgreSQLAccess
    Provides utility to connect with a PostgreSQL DBMS.
